About Locations Menu Reservations

Cutting House

Kansas City's best charcuterie

ABOUT

Cutting House is Kansas City's premiere market and eatery for charcuterie and other French brasserie-inspired dishes. Come join us for pâtés, rillettes, galantines, crépinettes and other classic dishes. Tasting courses and beverage pairings available on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.

Locations

Brookside

Dine with us in relaxed elegance at our Brookside location. This restaurant caters to those looking for a relaxed atmosphere. Replete with warming interiors and a welcoming patio with fire pit and reclining furniture, our guests allow us to diminish their work-day stressors.

Cutting House at Brookside

104 W 63rd Street

Kansas City, Missouri

+01 816.114.7124

Park Place

As a setting for more formal dining experiences, Cutting House at Leawood has no equal. Our Michelin-starred restaurant features expanded tasting menus, sparkling crystal glasses and silverware, and finer vintages of wines and ardent spirits. Our front-of-house staff seeks to make themselves available to you in the most helpful and welcoming of ways.

Cutting House at Leawood

11625 Rosewood Street

Leawood, KS

+01 913.764.0115

Offerings


Menu


Tasting menu, nine courses, chef's assortment | 260

Wine pairing | 160

Note, meal expected to last 3 hours. To provide the highest experience for our guests,
we request that all diners at a table partake in this tasting menu.

Deserts

Menu subject to nightly change. Our commitment to the highest quality ingredients is steadfast.

Reservations

Reservations are recommended for parties of
three or more guests at our Brookside location.

Reservations are required for parties of two or more at our Park Place
location and reservations fill quickly approximately one month in advance.

So that we may equally serve our guests, please call no more
than six weeks in advance and let us know of any changes
which may affect your ability to sit for your reservation.
